OOC: I'll take you up on that Zardus!

:::Starscream:::

::He looks across the room to see Demise.  he walks over::
Starscream: Hey there.  What you drinking for? Anything happen? Around here, 
when somone's drinking, somethings always up.

--part1_21.c5425ec.2845a215_boundary
